value:
$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Azura, what is it that you desire?$k$pTell me—anything you want. Any wish
can become real.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|There is an infinite number of worlds
here, my dear...$k$pAny world you can conceive of must
exist.$k$pYou can summon any version of
yourself that you desire.$k$p$EFace_Smile|All you have to do is listen to
one little request of mine. It isn't
much...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|With your blood and my power...
Everything will be just as we wish it...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Azura. Tell me what it is that you
desire...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|I want...a flying ship. I'll fly away with
everyone. We can go wherever we
like. Nothing bad will happen...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|That sounds lovely, dear.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|But what I want... What I truly want...$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Stop!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|Ah!$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Reality is harsh, and dreams are far
more pleasant... I understand this.
Believe me, I do.$k$pBut you can't dream forever.
Someday, the dream will end.$k$pIt's time to open your eyes, Azura.$k$p

$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|*sigh*$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|You look so sad, Azura. But you have
to stop feeling sorry for yourself. You
need to look beyond your pain...$k$pWalk toward your future, eyes open.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_夢カムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Dreaming18,Face|The strength we have seen is quite
fearsome. I'm sorry, Azura...$k$p$WmMPID_夢カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Dreaming18,Face|We have no choice but to retreat. The
contract we are under allows us no
other recourse. Azura, I am sorry...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|Don't go! Please...don't leave me
alone.$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Azura... You aren't alone.$k$pFor now, you may be wrapped in
your sorrow. Worse things may yet
happen to you. But someday...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|Shut up! You just shut up! How...
How can you possibly understand?$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Of course I understand. I know
exactly how you feel...because I am
you.$k$pAll of the pain, all of the sadness...
It is mine as well as yours.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|*sob*$k$pAagh! *SOB*$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|And that's that, I suppose. Oh well.
We have eternity to play...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So this was all your doing. You lured
in a child! What's your game, Loki?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse of Askr, who can open the
gateways to the realms...$k$pYou do not seem to understand the
nature of your own power.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You can open a way to any world you
choose...yet it is obvious that you fail
to understand the value of this ability.$k$pThose who don't understand the
power they command will inevitably
be destroyed by it.$k$p$EFace|Fortunately, my dear, you need not
worry. Stick with me, and we'll be
ready for whatever happens.$k$pSee you around, darling...$k$p$Sbs2000|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait! What did you mean?$k$p$EFace_Anger|She's talking about the power of
Askr...but why?$k$p$Sbs150|
